textContent:
---casual---

May nakita ako sa soc med dati haha. The more serious a relationship gets daw, the more casual it gets. And I'm happy to feel na we're finally getting to that part my bby!! Nakakautot ka na na kasama ako. HAHAHAHAHAHAHA. 

I love being so unserious with you because it makes my life more colorful and funny too. Basically even when we're doing boring casual stuff, it doesn't feel that way because I'm with you! Kaya nga pag di kita kasama, parang wala nakong alam gawin HAHAHAHAA. You've been so integrated in my life to the point na it just doesn't feel right when I'm not with you. 

Haay. I'm so excited sa araw na araw araw na tayong kakain ng rolling hot pandesal for breakfast.
title: July 19, 2024
textContentHtml:
---casual---


May nakita ako sa soc med dati haha. The more serious a relationship gets daw, the more casual it gets. And I'm happy to feel na we're finally getting to that part my bby!! Nakakautot ka na na kasama ako. HAHAHAHAHAHAHA. 


I love being so unserious with you because it makes my life more colorful and funny too. Basically even when we're doing boring casual stuff, it doesn't feel that way because I'm with you! Kaya nga pag di kita kasama, parang wala nakong alam gawin HAHAHAHAA. You've been so integrated in my life to the point na it just doesn't feel right when I'm not with you. 


Haay. I'm so excited sa araw na araw araw na tayong kakain ng rolling hot pandesal for breakfast.
